name: Engine PCV Valve and Hose Kit, Durable PCV Hose Compatible with Camry Corolla Highlander Solara Matrix RAV4 TC XB HS250h, Replace Part Number 12262-28021,12204-28020
short_description: 【Precise Fit】The ventilation PCV valve is produced strictly in accordance with the original factory standards. Part numbers 12262-28021 and 12204-28020 correspond to the PCV valve hose specifications of specific engine models, which can perfectly fit the engine-related interfaces, ensure seamless connection with the original vehicle system, and provide reliable parts replacement guarantee for engine maintenance without additional modification. ​

【High-quality Materials】The engine PCV valve and hose kit is made of high-quality materials that are oil-resistant, high-temperature-resistant and anti-aging. This material can not only withstand the high temperature environment when the engine is working, but also effectively resist the erosion of chemicals such as engine oil, maintain good sealing and extend service life.

【Complete Kit】The kit contains all necessary hoses that match the part number, without the need to purchase other accessories, to meet the needs of overall replacement of the PCV valve hose. Please check the part pictures and part numbers before purchasing to avoid purchasing errors or incurring unnecessary expenses.

【Convenient Installation】This PCV hose is designed to meet the original factory installation path, and can directly replace aging or damaged parts without professional and complex tools. Ordinary maintenance personnel can quickly complete the replacement, saving maintenance time and cost and improving work efficiency.​

【Applicable Models】Our PCV valve and hose kit is compatible with Scion TC 2005-2006; Toyota Camry 2002-2006; Toyota Highlander 2001-2007; Toyota Rav4 2001-2005; Toyota Solara 2002-2006; Lexus HS250H 2010-2012; Scion TC 2005-2010; Scion XB 2008-2015; Toyota Camry 2002-2011; Toyota Corolla 2009-2010; Toyota Highlander 2001; Toyota Matrix 2009-2013; Toyota Rav4 2001-2008; Toyota Solara 2004-2008

name: 99071AD690 PCV Valve Hoses, Automotive Vacuum Hose PCV Vacuum Hoses Replacement for Subaru Forester 2.5L 2011-2016, Crosstrek 2.0L 2015-2017, Intake Manifold Automotive Hose (1 Piece)
short_description: 【Precise OE Replacement】Directly replaces part numbers 99071AD690/99071AD630, specifically designed for Subaru Forester 2.5L (2011-2016) and Crosstrek 2.0L (2015-2017). The interface size matches the original part, allowing for direct installation without modification.

【Dual-Function Vacuum Hose】This PCV valve hose serves as both the PCV valve connection hose and the intake manifold vacuum hose. It effectively vents crankcase gases, maintains vacuum system pressure balance, reduces issues such as unstable idling and oil vapor leaks, and improves engine efficiency.

【High-Quality Construction】The automotive vacuum hose is made of high-quality rubber material, offering excellent oil resistance, high-temperature resistance, and corrosion resistance. It resists cracking, hardening, or deformation even under the complex conditions of the engine compartment, providing a much longer service life than ordinary hoses.

【Ready to Install】Comes in a single, individually packaged unit, ready for immediate use. No special tools are required for installation, making replacement quick and easy even for beginners, saving you the high labor costs of a 4S shop.

【Wide Compatibility】Includes both original equipment quality and cost-effective aftermarket options (Zookpr/FUSCH, etc.), manufactured strictly according to OE standards, ensuring stable and reliable performance to meet the purchasing preferences of different car owners.
